COMMENT_TX: ej,cleab801,C,merrd901,Balk non-call ej,mcnaj801,M,mckej901,Protesting manager's ejection $Angels manager McNamara ejected by HP umpire McKean for arguing pitcher balked when throwing to 1B which hit runner in neck, forcing him to leave for pinch-runner; Angels coach Clear ejected by 1B umpire Merrill protesting McNamara's ejection
ej,willb104,C,barnl901,Called strike 3 $Athletics coach Williams ejected by HP umpire Barnett for arguing called strike 3 to Henderson
ej,andes101,M,cousd901,Balls and strikes Tigers manager Sparky Anderson ejected bu HP umpire Derryl Cousins
CS may have occurred with O'Brien or Parrish at bat
ej,wockj001,P,voltv901,Balls and strikes $Catcher Wockenfuss ejected by HP umpire Voltaggio for arguing balls and strikes
timing assumed
DWS: clearly not CS, not certain a continuation of single
$Glenn Wilson dropped the fly ball but got the force
ej,wilcm001,P,pales901,Balk Milt Wilcox ejected by HP umpire Steve Palermo for continuing to argue about the balk
$Estimated 540 feet, ball cleared Trumbull Avenue and landed in lumber yard; it was the 14th ball to be hit completely out of Tiger Stadium since 1938 remodeling

umpchange,6,umphome,fordd901 umpchange,6,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Barnett injured back when Gibson ran over him trying for inside the park homer; Whitaker was tagged out at home on same play, but Gibson was right behind him, Barnett was in the baseline and Gibson hit him and catcher who dropped ball for error as Gibson was called safe; Red Sox claimed catcher did not drop ball and loose ball seen on the ground came out of umpire's pocket; Barnett left field on stretcher; 2B umpire Ford went behind plate and game was finished with 3 umpires
ej,dempr001,P,voltv901,Balls and strikes Rick Dempsey ejected by HP umpire Vic Voltaggio
suspended,19830730,DET04,curfew $Game suspended for curfew and resumed the next day
Chet Lemon injured diving for Joe Simpson's line drive
Debut game for Frank Wills
$Lance Parrish called for interference on steal attempt
ej,nelsd101,C,clara901,Arguing pickoff move was balk White Sox coach Dave Nelson ejected by 1B umpire Al Clark arguing that pitcher's throw to 1B was a balk sometime in game
ej,duncd101,C,clara901,Checked swing White Sox coach Dave Duncan ejected by 3B umpire Al Clark for arguing checked swing appeal on 0-2 pitch
DWS: check TSN, but likely Brookens went to third
Foul tip on strike three
Barry Bonnell hurt sliding back to 1B; removed from game
ej,cox-b103,M,reedr901,Call at 1B $Blue Jays manager Cox ejected by 1B umpire Reed for arguing that Upshaw was safe at 1st
22 minute rain delay before start of game
1:33 rain delay - game called
ej,trama001,P,reedr901,Called third strike (Threw helmet) Alan Trammell ejected by HP umpire Rick Reed for throwing helmet after strikeout
